newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech Feb real industrial sales - 3.6 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Czech Feb real industrial sales - 3.6 pct yr/yr.

text.p: Czech real industrial sales fell 3.6 percent year-on-year in February after a 0.2 percent year-on-year fall in January, according to preliminary data from the Czech Statistical Bureau on Tuesday.
Nominal industrial wages rose 16.2 percent year-on-year in February after a 14.4 percent rise year-on-year in January, the bureau said.
Industrial sales in the first two months of 1997 were 1.7 percent lower than in the corresponding period of 1996 while nominal wages were 15.2 percent higher in the period.
Final data would be available on April 9, the statistical bureau said. (Figures are for year-on-year percentage change)
